name: chipchilders.github.io
body:
# cloudstack_ruby_client

A ruby client library for the CloudStack native API. 

License: ASLv2

Code: (https://github.com/chipchilders/cloudstack_ruby_client)

Gem: (http://rubygems.org/gems/cloudstack_ruby_client)

![cloudstack_ruby_client](http://chipchilders.github.io/img/cloudstack_ruby_client.png)

# cloudstack-sim-gen

A working prototype indended to help generate scenarios that can be run against the Apache CloudStack management server, specifically when running in simulator mode.

License: TBD

Code: (https://github.com/chipchilders/cloudstack-sim-gen)

![cloudstack_simgen](http://chipchilders.github.io/img/cloudstack_simgen.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
